acorn_grove_0.intro: You wake up in an acorn grove, seemingly smaller than usual.

intro_squirrel.name: Eckard
intro_squirrel.attack: You try to throw a punch, but you realize you're a squirrel
intro_squirrel.interact: "Hello fellow squirrel ... Wait! You're not supposed to be a squirrel! You need to get to the demetamorphinator! I think Gottfried knows where it is. Ask him!"
intro_squirrel.inspect: Eckard's large bushy tail sways in the ever so acorn grove wind, catching colorless squirrel weather intuitions.

portal_squirrel.name: Gottfried
portal_squirrel.attack: You try to throw a punch, but you realize you're a squirrel.
portal_squirrel.interact: "Curious Curious Curious ... You're looking for the 'demetamorphinator?' Just follow me!" You follow Gottfried into the hollow of a tree, but just as you cross the threshold, you stumble over your squirrel claws and fall into a gaping chasm ...
portal_squirrel.inspect: Gottfried's matted and unruly fur is knotted in ways that would puzzle the most dedicated of knot theorists.

room_storey_i_0.name: Lobby
room_storey_i_0.introduce: *Crash!* You land on a sofa in the University of South Carolina M Bert Storey Research and Innovation Center Lobby! The lights have not yet begun to quit their work, but it still seems like there's something you're failing to acknowledge about this room.

intro_joe.name: THE Joe Hardy
intro_joe.introduce: You see the comparatively enormous stature of Joe Hardy leaning against a wall.
intro_joe.attack: You try to scratch Joe, but he kicks you back.
intro_joe.interact: "Oh shoot, you can talk? Anyway, I'm assuming you want to get through that door. The first thing you'll need is a peanut butter and hummus sandwich."
intro_joe.inspect: Joe's hair contains hints of green so slight they might be mere references to the past.

sans_sandwich_joe.name: STILL Joe Hardy
sans_sandwich_joe.introduce: "Nice to see you again but where's the sandwich?"
sans_sandwich_joe.attack: You try to kick Joe, but he dodges and says, "Hey! I thought we were friends."
sans_sandwich_joe.interact: Joe appears angry: "How dare you come back without the sandwich?". Then he adds, "That's fine, I'm allergic to peanut butter anyways. What else do you have in your inventory?"

sandwich_joe.name: STILL Joe Hardy
sandwich_joe.introduce: You spot a manic Joe Hardy yearning for food.
sandwich_joe.attack: Joe aggressively attacks you before you were able to strike a hit.
sandwich_joe.interact: You hand over the peanut butter and hummus sandwich to Joe. He says: "(munches) Thanks for the sandwich, but if you look closely (munches again), the door was open all along."

elephant_in_the_room.interact: Take this sealed, food-safe jar of peanut butter
elephant_in_the_room.attack: **The elephant will no longer give you peanut butter**
elephant_in_the_room.inspect: It seems like nobody else in the room can see the elephant...

security.name: Security Bread
security.introduce: You bump into a security guard roaming around the floor.
security.attack: You try to punch the security, but he manhandles you to the ground and handcuffs you. **He had the right bread but you choose violence instead.**
security.interact:
"You want the right right bread, right? Right. Answer my riddle right and you'll be left left with the right right bread:
Left Left-Right, son of Right Right and Left Left, brother of Right Left-Right, writes right, drives right. Left Left LEFT Left Left-Right with Right Right and Right Left-Right, which isn't right. Who is left?"
security.right_answer: Right, "Right"! Right, You'll now be left left with the right right bread.
security.non_right_answer: Sorry, but that answer just isn't 'right'!
security.inspect: The security guard seems partially (mentally) composed of left and right hands. Where one would expect a set of shoes, he instead has wisdom.

almanac.name: Friendly Sunflower and Dusty Old Almanac
almanac.introduce: You find a personable sunflower and an extremely rusty, beat-up almanac laying in the janitor's closet.
almanac.attack: You tear up the pages, leaving pieces scattered around. The pieces suddenly reform and reveal the book to be %d pages away from losing it.
almanac.interact: "Hello, squirrel. I've been searching through this book all day, but every time I get five pages in, it closes on me."
almanac.inspect:
The sunflower has all the aspects characteristic of such a creature:
A bright ring of ray florets, smaller, dimmer, inner florets, and a rough stalk.
You wonder how it remains bright in as dull a location as a janitor's closet.
The almanac has 32 pages, which may somehow be connected to the number 5...
almanac.too_high: The book rustles in a way so as to indicate that a better page might precede the current.
almanac.too_low: The book rustles in a way so as to indicate that a better page might succeed the current.
almanac.correct_page:
"Wow, you found the right page! ... Wow, this is brilliant!
It says here that for the next year, the sun will move from east to west! I'm saved! I don't need this spatially conditionally usable slice of bread anymore!"
almanac.break:
"If I knew you were just going to fail, I wouldn't have let you touch the book in the first place! How am I ever going to find the sun?!"
The almanac slams shut and bursts into flames.
A new dusty old almanac is born from the ashes.

found_almanac.name: Friendly Sunflower and Distinct Lack of Almanac
found_almanac.introduce: You find a personable sunflower and a spot where an almanac used to be...
found_almanac.attack: You slash your squirrel claws at the lack of an almanac and create a lack of action.
found_almanac.interact: "Hello, squirrel. Thanks for helping me solve the puzzle. I can finally be sure of the sun's location from within this dim closet!"
found_almanac.inspect:
The sunflower has all the aspects characteristic of such a creature:
A bright ring of ray florets, smaller, dimmer, inner florets, and a rough stalk.
You wonder how it remains bright in as dull a location as a janitor's closet.
The almanac has 32 pages, which may somehow be connected to the number 5...

trash_can.name: Trash Can
trash_can.introduce: You see the only available trash can on the 1st floor.
trash_can.attack: You knock over the trash can, revealing a sealed, clean, food-safe hummus.
trash_can.inspect: Flies circulate around the trash bin.

first_door.name: Transport Door
first_door.introduce: You figured it out! The door was open all along.
first_door.interact: Transport is a success! Onto the next floor.
first_door.inspect: The glowing door has a surprise behind it.
